actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970 to stabilize the prices of propane and butane.

summary.text: Directs the President, under the Econonic Stabilization Act, to: (1) stabilize the refinery level prices of propane and butane at the May 15, 1973 prices; and (2) permit adjustments in such prices in specified instances.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970 to stabilize the prices of propane and butane.
